00051 void CHPTilingFileReaderTest::testCreation()
00052 {
00053         CHPTilingFileReader reader;
00054         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00055 }
00056 
00057 void CHPTilingFileReaderTest::testRead()
00058 {
00059         CHPTilingData data;
00060         CHPTilingFileReader reader;
00061         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.SetFilename("../data/CHP_tiling_file"));
00062         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_NO_THROW(reader.Read(data));
00063 
00064         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetFilename() == "../data/CHP_tiling_file");
00065         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetNumberSequences() == 2);
00066         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgName() == L"tile");
00067         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetAlgVersion() == L"1.0");
00068 
00069         ParameterNameValueTypeList params = data.GetAlgParams();
00070         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(params.size() == 1);
00071         ParameterNameValueTypeList::iterator it=params.begin();
00072         ParameterNameValueType &param = *it;
00073         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"p1");
00074         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"v1");
00075 
00076         const double eps=0.00001;
00077         CHPTilingEntry e;
00078         TilingSequenceData seq;
00079 
00080         data.OpenTilingSequenceDataSet(0);
00081         seq = data.GetTilingSequenceData();
00082         
00083         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.name == L"n1");
00084         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.groupName == L"g1");
00085         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.version == L"v1");
00086         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.parameters.size() == 1);
00087         it = seq.parameters.begin();
00088         param = *it;
00089         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"seq1_p1");
00090         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"seq1_v1");
00091 
00092         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetTilingSequenceEntryCount(0) == 2);
00093         data.GetTilingSequenceEntry(0, e);
00094         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 10);
00095         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.value, 10.0f, eps);
00096 
00097         data.GetTilingSequenceEntry(1, e);
00098         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 20);
00099         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.value, 20.0f, eps);
00100 
00101 
00102         data.OpenTilingSequenceDataSet(1);
00103         seq = data.GetTilingSequenceData();
00104         
00105         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.name == L"n2");
00106         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.groupName == L"g2");
00107         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.version == L"v2");
00108         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(seq.parameters.size() == 1);
00109         it = seq.parameters.begin();
00110         param = *it;
00111         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetName() == L"seq2_p1");
00112         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(param.GetValueText() == L"seq2_v1");
00113 
00114         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(data.GetTilingSequenceEntryCount(1) == 3);
00115         data.GetTilingSequenceEntry(0, e);
00116         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 11);
00117         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.value, 11.0f, eps);
00118 
00119         data.GetTilingSequenceEntry(1, e);
00120         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 21);
00121         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.value, 21.0f, eps);
00122 
00123         data.GetTilingSequenceEntry(2, e);
00124         CPPUNIT_ASSERT(e.position == 31);
00125         CPPUNIT_ASSERT_DOUBLES_EQUAL(e.value, 31.0f, eps);
00126 }
